Key Match Events: The Yankees made the Guardians pay in the most pivotal moments in Game 5, winning their first pennant in 15 years.
Giancarlo Stanton hit a 446-foot home run in the sixth inning.
Juan Soto hit a decisive home run in the 10th inning to clinch the Yankees' spot in the World Series.
Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees took advantage as Cleveland wore down, with the Guardians trying to ride their bullpen to the World Series but breaking at the end.
